item.title: Ticket #466 (pages admin doesn't show hierarchy) created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description: pages admin doesn't show hierarchy like category admin.

item.title: Ticket #465 (Link to Web Interface Config File Creator broken) created
item.dc:creator: Sandman
item.description:
When you attempt to go to:

(root)wp-admin/install.php

And there is no config file present; the link to the web interface config file creator is broken. Insead of:

(root)wp-admin/setup-config.php

You get this instead:

(root)wp-admin/wp-admin/setup-config.php

item.title: Changeset [1857]: Improvements to page handling. Move form to own page, put under ...
item.dc:creator: saxmatt
item.description: Improvements to page handling. Move form to own page, put under "Write", ambiguiate language, and fix redirect.

item.title: Ticket #464 (pages admin always says 'create new page') created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description: pages admin always says 'create new page', even if it's an existing page. could this be changed to 'save' or something?

item.title: Ticket #463 (wp_list_pages needs hierarchy) created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description: as it says in a code comment, wp_list_pages needs hierarchy. the code exists in the admin interface, but uses a bunch of db calls. it works, though. see attachment.

item.title: Ticket #462 (wp_list_pages should be added to default index) created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description: as it says in the codex, wp_list_pages should be added to the default index.

item.title: Ticket #461 (create new page -> write) created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description:
the 'write' button should have a tab that defaults to 'post' but includes the option to write a 'page'.

rather than manage -> pages -> bottom_of_page to write a new page, it should be write -> page. makes more sense :)

item.title: Ticket #460 (children mess up highlighting in cats admin) created
item.dc:creator: trevorturk
item.description: children mess up the highlighting of alternate rows in the categories admin interface. see screenshot.
